definitions.body: fatness, abundance, luxuriance, oil, Ju Jdg 9:9 (of olive tree); abundance, fertility Ps 63:6 (in simile ‖[[חֵלֶב]]), Ps 65:12, of food and drink, Job 36:16, Je 31:14; passing over into fig. of spiritual blessing Ps 36:9 ([[ביתך]] ´[[ד]]), Is 55:2.
fat ashes, i.e. ashes of victims, mixed with the fat Le 1:16, Le 4:12, Le 4:12, Le 6:3, Le 6:4 (all P) Je 31:40, 1Ki 13:3, 1Ki 13:5.
